short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrating Pixels Online into Discord Rich Presence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Pixels Rich Presence (PRP) 🌟

✨ PRP  is a browser extension and server application that connects the Pixels Game to Discord Rich Presence, allowing you to share your in-game activity with your Discord friends in real-time.


💡 Key Features 💡

🔹 Real-time Discord Rich Presence Integration: Share your in-game activity on Discord in real-time, showing your friends which map you're currently exploring, farming, or interacting with.
🔹 Custom Map Descriptions: Automatically display customized location descriptions based on your current in-game map.
🔹 Auto-Clear Presence: Your Discord status will be cleared automatically when you close the game.
🔹 Taskbar Icon: Easily manage the server application with a convenient taskbar icon.
🔹 Customizable AFK marker


📦 How to Install 📦

[WARNING]
!!!THIS EXTENSION + SERVER WILL ONLY WORK IF YOU HAVE THE DISCORD (CLIENT) APP INSTALLED! THIS WILL NOT WORK WITH DISCORDS WEB VERSION!!!

1. Install the Chrome Extension here.
2. Download the Server Application (portable or installer): Required for Discord Rich Presence integration. Get the Windows version here: https://github.com/MrMidnight7331/Pixels-Rich-Presence/releases
3. Install the extension by running the application / running the portable version without installing.
4. Start Playing: Once installed, the extension will automatically connect and your Discord status will sync with in-game details when you are playing Pixels Online on play.pixels.xyz


🛠 Upcoming Features 🛠

🔹 macOS support
🔹Improved map and task tracking
🔹Enhanced customization options for in-game events
🔹More customization options
